airwallex-cli.description: CLI for Airwallex to manage transfers, beneficiaries, and balances

beeper-cli.description: CLI for interacting with Beeper Desktop's local API

brandfetch-cli.description: CLI for Brandfetch to fetch logos, colors, and brand assets

controld-cli.description: CLI for ControlD DNS management - manage devices, profiles, and DNS filtering

deel-cli.description: CLI for Deel to manage contracts, invoices, and payments

deputy-cli.description: CLI for Deputy to manage employees, timesheets, rosters, and leave

dub-cli.description: CLI for Dub.co to manage links, domains, analytics, and workspaces

eightsleep-cli.description: CLI for Eight Sleep to control temperature, alarms, and sleep metrics

fastmail-cli.description: CLI for Fastmail to manage emails, folders, and masked addresses

forward-email.description: CLI for Forward Email to manage domains, aliases, and email operations

line-cli.description: CLI for LINE Official Account / Messaging API

notte-cli.description: CLI for Notte to automate browsers, extract data, and run tasks

twenty-cli.description: CLI for Twenty CRM to manage people, companies, opportunities, and tasks
